name: Downtime
description:
Grab a few friends, create some characters and solve problems.

Downtime is a storytelling RPG that takes place in the part of TTRPGs that is usually left off screen, chilling at home. I firmly believe that every TTRPG adventurer is nice and can't help but help people even on their break. So, I've created a low stakes game all about them hanging out at home and helping their friends with stuff because they're cool like that.

This game is inspired Follow by Ben Robbins. If you liked this game, you'd probably really enjoy Follow. 
http://www.lamemage.com/follow/
